title: kaneda_3301
author: kaneda_3301
content: I'm excited to share that I've been working on my very own CryptoNote implementation! The implementation centers around using Haraka as the Proof-of-Work (PoW) algorithm, ensuring that the system remains efficient and secure.While the project is still in progress, I've made significant strides in its development. The specs and details are yet to be finalized, as I want to ensure that every aspect of the implementation meets the highest standards of security and performance.By integrating Haraka as the PoW mechanism, my CryptoNote implementation aims to achieve impressive throughput, even for short-input scenarios. Haraka's efficient hashing for post-quantum applications perfectly aligns with the requirements of the CryptoNote protocol, making it an ideal choice for the Proof-of-Work algorithm.I'm dedicated to crafting a robust and privacy-focused CryptoNote implementation that upholds the principles of decentralization and user anonymity. In the coming days, I'll be diligently finalizing the specifications and conducting thorough testing to guarantee the system's resilience against potential attacks and ensure its seamless functionality.I look forward to unveiling the full details of my CryptoNote implementation soon, and I'm eager to contribute to the ever-evolving landscape of blockchain technology with this exciting project. Stay tuned for further updates as the development progresses!https://t.me/yentruckchainhttps://eprint.iacr.org/2016/098.pdf

comments.author: grulles
comments.body: Il y  a des chances que ce soit lui !
